description.title: HP LaserJet Enterprise MFP M528dn Multifunctional Mono Laser Printer
description.details: The HP M528DN Multifunctional LaserJet Enterprise Printer is a business-oriented laser printer with great performance. It provides efficient black printing with a 1200 x 1200 dpi resolution, delivering sharp and clear text. Its duplex printing function allows it to print on both sides of the page instantly, saving time and decreasing paper waste. The printer is suitable with a variety of printing environments since it supports languages such as HP PCL 5, HP PCL 6, HP Postscript Level 3 (Emulation), and Native PDF. It offers a rapid print speed of 45 ppm for black documents and a duplex print speed of 34 ipm. The printer offers a short first print time of 6 seconds for black prints, allowing you to print your papers right away. It can handle high-volume printing demands with a monthly duty cycle of 150,000 pages and a suggested monthly volume of 7,500 pages. The HP M528DN is ideal for office locations where space is limited, with dimensions of 19 x 19.6 x 19.5" (W x H x D) and a weight of 47.18 lb. It combines high-quality printing, scanning, and copying capabilities with advanced functionality and reliability, making it an excellent choice for enterprises with high-volume printing requirements.

description.title: Efficient Printing with Duplex Capability
description.details: The HP M528DN provides bright and sharp black printouts with a print resolution of 1200 x 1200 dpi. Its quick printing speed of 45 ppm (black) allows for quick document generation, increasing job productivity. The printer also offers duplex printing, which allows for automated double-sided printing while conserving paper and money.

description.title: Wide Format Support and Large Paper Capacity
description.details: The HP M528DN has two input trays and one output tray for diverse media handling. It supports a broad range of media sizes, from 2.99 x 5" to a maximum of 8.5 x 14.02", and is capable of handling a wide range of document types. The printer has a large paper capacity, with 100 sheets in Input Tray 1, 550 pages in Input Tray 2, and up to 250 sheets in the output tray. It also accepts unique media, such as envelopes.

description.title: Flatbed Scanner with ADF and High Resolution
description.details: The HP M528DN scans documents efficiently due to its integrated flatbed scanner and automated document feeding (ADF). The scanner has a maximum optical resolution of 600 dpi, which ensures precise and detailed scans. It supports color and grayscale scanning modes, as well as a wide range of file formats such as JPEG, Multi-Page TIFF, PDF, PDF/A, TIFF, and XPS. The copier feature provides for simple duplicating, with choices for up to 9999 copies, duplex copying, and a color document copy quality of 600 x 600 dpi.

description.title: Seamless Connectivity and User-Friendly Interface
description.details: The HP M528DN provides seamless communication through RJ45 and USB-B connectors, making it simple to integrate into network infrastructures. It is compatible with a wide range of common operating systems, including Android, Windows, iOS, and macOS. The printer has an 8-inch touchscreen display with an easy-to-use interface for navigation and control.

description.title: Optimal Operating Conditions and Energy Efficiency
description.details: The temperature range for the HP M528DN is 42 to 65°F, with a suggested humidity range of 30 to 70%. It draws 629 W at full load but has energy-saving capabilities that reduce power consumption during standby and sleep modes. During operation, the printer produces a maximum acoustic noise level of 6.8 BA and 54 dBA under pressure.

description.title: Epson EcoTank L15160 A3 Wi-Fi Duplex All-in-One Ink Tank Printer
description.details: The Epson EcoTank L15160 A3 Wi-Fi Duplex All-in-One Ink Tank Printer is the perfect choice for businesses requiring fast and high-volume A3 color printing. This printer is specifically designed to minimize costs associated with duplex printing and scanning, supporting up to A3 size documents. With the utilization of the latest pigment ink technology known as DURABrite ET INK, the printer produces sharp, clear, and long-lasting prints that are resistant to water damage. The compact design of the Epson EcoTank L15160 allows it to easily fit into any office space, taking up minimal room. Epson understands the importance of both quality and cost savings, which is why they pay close attention to even the smallest details when developing their products. Featuring a fast color print speed of up to 25.0 ipm (Simplex), this printer ensures efficient and time-saving printing processes. It can handle prints up to A3+ size for simplex printing, accommodating larger documents and projects. The automatic duplex printing feature enables the printer to print on both sides of the paper automatically, further reducing paper waste and saving valuable resources. With an ultra-high page yield of 7,500 pages for black ink and 6,000 pages for color ink, the Epson EcoTank L15160 ensures a longer period of uninterrupted printing before ink replacement is required. This contributes to improved productivity and reduced operating costs for businesses. The printer offers versatile connectivity options, including Wi-Fi, Wi-Fi Direct, and Ethernet, providing flexibility and convenience in setting up and accessing the printer from multiple devices. The Epson Connect feature allows users to print and scan remotely through various applications such as Epson iPrint, Epson Email Print, and Remote Print Driver. Additionally, the Scan to Cloud functionality enables easy and direct scanning of documents to cloud storage services. The Epson EcoTank L15160 A3 Wi-Fi Duplex All-in-One Ink Tank Printer is a reliable and efficient solution for businesses seeking high-quality A3 color printing. It combines fast printing speeds, duplex functionality, cost-effective ink usage, and versatile connectivity options to meet the demands of modern businesses while ensuring excellent print quality and reduced operating costs.

description.title: HP Color LaserJet Pro MFP M479fdw Multifunction Color Laser Printer
description.details: Winning in business means working smarter. The HP Color LaserJet Pro MFP M479 is designed to let you focus your time where it's most effective-growing your business and staying ahead of the competition. HP Office Laser Multifunction Printers are designed for SMBs and small workteams in larger companies, delivering enhanced productivity, simplified workflows and reduced costs. Dynamic security enabled printer. Only intended to be used with cartridges using an HP original chip. Cartridges using a non-HP chip may not work, and those that work today may not work in the future. Scan files directly to Microsoft SharePoint, email, USB, and network folders. Help save time by automating all the steps in a complicated workflow and apply saved settings. Print effortlessly from any device, virtually anywhere, to any HP printer securely through the cloud. A suite of embedded security features help protect your MFP from being an entry point for attacks. Help ensure security of confidential information with optional PIN/Pull printing to retrieve print jobs. Optional HP JetAdvantage Security Manager lets you set configurationThwart potential attacks and take immediate action with instant notification of security issues. Set up this MFP fast, and easily manage device settings to help increase overall printing efficiency.Tackle tasks quickly and easily with the simple 4.3" (10.9cm) color touchscreen.Print Microsoft office formatted files in addition to PDFs right off your USB drive. Avoid interruptions with an HP LaserJet MFP designed to be streamlined for maximum productivity. Avoid frustrating reprints, wasted supplies, and service calls using Original HP toner cartridges.Help save paper right out of the box. The duplex print setting is set at default paper savings mode. Saves up to 18% energy over prior products. Help save energy with HP Auto-on/Auto-off technology.
